_comment: Medium configuration with random crossover and random mutation
_comment_profile: Balanced execution with high exploration - random crossover creates novel combinations while random mutation adaptively selects different mutation strategies

_comment_crossover_descriptions.random: Creates new random subtrees at crossover points instead of exchanging existing ones

_comment_mutation_descriptions.random: Randomly selects between different mutation types (subtree, node, constant, or function mutation)

_comment_performance_notes.max_depth: Standard depth of 6 for medium complexity expressions
_comment_performance_notes.population_size: Medium population for balanced exploration vs computation time
_comment_performance_notes.max_generations: Moderate generations allowing thorough search without excessive runtime
_comment_performance_notes.tournament_size: Increased to 4 for better selection pressure with higher exploration
_comment_performance_notes.mutation_prob: Higher mutation rate to complement random mutation strategy
_comment_performance_notes.exploration_focus: Both operators maximize exploration and diversity in feature synthesis
